description.lang: Standard form factor and appearance of the light bulb with 800 lm output RGBW: dimmable from 5% to 100%, tunable from 1800K to 6500K, and 16 million colors Possible to be included in groups, scenes, or schedules Suitable for indoor lighting: Corridors, Bedroom, Living Room, etc.
Set Configuration parameter 0x50 0: nothing.1: Send the Basic Report.2. Send Device Reset Locally CC

name.lang: User custom mode for LED animations.

description.lang: User custom mode for LED animations.0 = Disable custom mode.1= Blink Colors in order mode.2=Randomized blink color mode
Disable custom mode
Blink Colors in order mode.
Randomized blink color mode

name.lang: Ramp rate when dimming using Multilevel Switch V1 CC in 100ms

description.lang: Ramp rate when dimming using Multilevel Switch V1 CC in 100msValue range = 0x00 -0x64
Specifying the ramp rate when dimming using Multilevel Switch V1 CC in 100ms
Enable/Disable Strobe over Custom Color.0 = Disable.1 = Enable.Others = Ignore.
Disable Strobe over Custom Color.
Enable Strobe over Custom Color.

name.lang: Set the rate of change to next color in Custom Mode.

description.lang: Set the rate of change to next color in Custom Mode.Value1 ~ Value4:Value Range = 5 - 8640000 (50 - 86400000ms)
Set the specified rate of change to next color in Custom Mode.

name.lang: Set color that LED Bulb blinks in (Blink Mode)

description.lang: Set color that LED Bulb blinks in (Blink Mode)-128 to 127 corresponds with the unsigned values 0 to 255 or hex values 0x00 to 0xFF
Set color that LED Bulb blinks in (Blink Mode)

name.lang: Enable to send notifications to associated devices (Group 1) when the state of LED Bulb is changed.

description.lang: Enable to send notifications to associated devices(Group 1) when the state of LED Bulb is changed.0 = Nothing.1= Basic CC report.
Nothing
Send basic report to associated devices when the state of the LED Bulb is changed

name.lang: The user can configure the parameter to adjust the color component Warm White.

description.lang: The user can configure the parameter to adjust the color component Warm White. Value range =Warm White(0x0A8C(2700k) ~ 0x1387 (4999k))
Value range =Warm White(0x0A8C(2700k) ~ 0x1387 (4999k))

name.lang: The user can configure the parameter to adjust the color component Cold White.

description.lang: The user can configure the parameter to adjust the color component Cold White. Value rang = Cold White (0x1388 (5000k) ~ 0x1964 (6500k))
Value rang = Cold White (0x1388 (5000k) ~ 0x1964 (6500k))
